items.label: relevant
reasons: Explicitly discusses economic growth forecasts for both the US and the eurozone, key drivers for EUR/USD.
Mentions factors influencing US dollar depreciation, a direct USD driver.
High-quality source (S&P Global) with comprehensive economic analysis.

items.label: relevant
